Package edu.ifmo.tikunov.lab4.storage.file

Class BufferedFileManager

java.lang.Object
edu.ifmo.tikunov.lab4.storage.file.BufferedFileManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileManager
public class BufferedFileManager extends Object implements FileManager
Implementation of FileManager interface based on BufferedOutputStream and BufferedInputStream.
See Also:
FileManager, BufferedOutputStream, BufferedInputStream
